title: Kulkarni Chaukatla Deshpande
overview: Jaya divorces her husband and goes to Mumbai she is an MBA graduate and and does well in her profession.She finds love again in Satish and both get married and having kids from their first marriage Rahul and Amey.Things are going well until they go for a vacation in Ladakh, Jaya's son Amey feels lost in new relationship where as Satish son Rahul teases him to change his last name from Deshpande to Kulkarni.
